title: Replace app logo everywhere with resized generated assets

requirements.summary: Add a resized, centered, padded logo asset set (app logo, favicons, apple touch icon, social preview) generated from the uploaded image and stored as static public assets.
acceptanceCriteria: New logo image files exist under frontend/public/assets/generated with the filenames specified in imageRequirements.required.
All generated logo assets are square where applicable, visually centered, and do not appear stretched.
Small-size assets (16x16, 32x32) remain recognizable with simplified/clean edges (no accidental cropping).

file_operations.description: Create square brand logo (512x512) with transparent background; ensure the mark is centered with comfortable padding and not distorted.
Create simplified square favicon (32x32) with transparent background; ensure the logo is centered, padded, and remains recognizable at small size.
Create simplified square favicon (16x16) with transparent background; ensure no accidental cropping and clean edges so it remains recognizable.
Create apple touch icon (180x180); ensure the logo is centered with padding suitable for iOS icon rendering.
Create Open Graph social preview image (1200x630) on a clean light background with the logo centered and prominent.

requirements.summary: Replace all in-app UI logo references (header + landing hero at minimum) with the new generated brand logo asset.
acceptanceCriteria: Header logo displays the new logo on desktop and mobile header states.
Landing page hero logo displays the new logo.
No remaining references to "/assets/generated/controller-logo.dim_512x512.png" are used for the brand logo in the header/hero after the update.

file_operations.description: Update the header brand to use the new logo at frontend/public/assets/generated/kslab-logo.dim_512x512.png and ensure it renders correctly in both desktop and mobile header states.
Update the landing hero logo to use the new logo at frontend/public/assets/generated/kslab-logo.dim_512x512.png; keep existing sizing behavior while ensuring the logo is not distorted.

requirements.summary: Update the HTML head to use the new favicon, apple touch icon, and Open Graph social preview image assets.
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/index.html includes favicon link tags pointing to the generated 16x16 and 32x32 assets.
frontend/index.html includes an apple-touch-icon link pointing to the generated 180x180 asset.
frontend/index.html includes Open Graph image metadata referencing the generated 1200x630 asset.

file_operations.description: Add/replace head tags to reference frontend/public/assets/generated/kslab-favicon.dim_16x16.png and frontend/public/assets/generated/kslab-favicon.dim_32x32.png (favicon), frontend/public/assets/generated/kslab-apple-touch-icon.dim_180x180.png (apple-touch-icon), and frontend/public/assets/generated/kslab-og-image.dim_1200x630.png (Open Graph image metadata).
